is.merkor.core.database.data
Interface PersistentObject

All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractPersistentObject, ClusterCBC, ClusterCBCStub, ClusterItem, HierarchClusterCBC, HierarchClusterCBCStub, IceDictSense, LexicalItem, LexicalItemStub, LexicalRelation, LexicalRelationType, SimilarityCooccRelation, SimilarityVerbObjRelation, WordPair
public interface PersistentObject

Provides basic methods for persistent objects using timestamp as version indicator.

Version:
1.0
Author:
Anna B. Nikulasdottir

Method Detail

getId

java.lang.Long getId()
Returns the id of this persistentObject. id holds the value used as primary key in the MerkOr database.

Returns:
id of the PersistentObject.

setId

void setId(java.lang.Long id)
Sets the id attribute.

Parameters:
id -
Throws:
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if param 'id' is null

getVersion

java.util.Date getVersion()
Returns the version of this persistentObject. In the MerkOr database version is timestamp of the last modification.

Returns:
java.util.Date of the last modification

setVersion

void setVersion(java.util.Date version)
Sets the version attribute.

Parameters:
version -
Throws:
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if param 'version' is null
